text: (And thou wilt see each nation) the adherents of each religion (crouching) gathered, (each nation) the adherents of each religion (summoned to its record) to read the record of their good and bad deeds; some will be given their record in their right hands and others in their left. ((And it will be said unto them): This day ye are requited what ye used to do) and say in the life of the world.
